record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 2116
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 2116 -- (House of Representatives - July 19, 2007)

[Page: H8173]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that my name be removed as a cosponsor of H.R. 2116, the Freight Rail Infrastructure Capacity Expansion Act of 2007.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Oregon?
